reg_pit.acttitle: Food and Agricultural Products Classification Act
reg_pit.title: Egg Grading and Standards Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1, definition of "producer" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: producerÂ means an operator who transports or distributes domestic eggs produced only on his or her own farm;

change.changenote: Section 7 (2) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who distributes rejects must keep, at his or her facility, a record containing at least the following information with respect to each transaction in which rejects were distributed:

change.changenote: Section 11 (2) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who distributes inedible processed eggs must keep, at his or her facility, a record containing at least the following information with respect to each transaction in which inedible processed eggs were distributed:
